episode_event_specialcos01_main/4001_100:
Let’s do our utmost and battle to our
heart’s content.
Yeah. No hard feelings, even if we beat ya down!
Let’s do this, Diantha! We’re definitely gonna win!

Peh. If we’re doin’ this, OUR team’ll win it all and
have the last laugh!
I-I’ll do my best to support you!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4001_110:
The leaders of each team have exchanged a few
words and are headed back to their base camps!

And now, without further ado...it’s time to kick off
the Battle of the Golden Spheres!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4002_100: All right, peeps! We’ve got this in the bag!

Fwahahaha! Our reliable general is leading his
troops from the front lines!
Let’s be on our way, Janine!
Oh dear. Look at all this hustle and bustle.
We should probably head out, too.
Hurry! There’s no time to lose!

W-wait for me! It’s really hard to move in
this costume...

There’s no need to rush, m’lady. Go at your
own pace.
I’ll stay by your side and help you out.
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4003_100:
So your partner Pokémon Keldeo is in its
Resolute Form, huh?

I’ve heard that it’s a Pokémon that changes form
when its resolve for battle is strong!

I see! I’ve also heard stories of your partner
Pokémon, Diancie, back in the Kalos region.

They say that its pink, glimmering body is the
loveliest sight in the whole world.

Pardon the interruption! Diantha, how would
you like us to approach this battle?

Let’s see... Perhaps we should discuss this as
a team.

If this is a search for golden spheres, we should
probably split up to find them!

Hmm... Traveling as a large group might be safer
if we run into anyone who’ll try to attack us...

But that also means we’d lose range and mobility,
so it might not be the best option for this event.

It does sound like it’d be better to spread out and
search rather than stay together, then.

I see. So it’s decided, right? Our plan is to spread
out and look for those spheres?

Oui! Everyone on our team is strong, and we’ll all
be fine even when we’re apart!
Very well! Ahem!

Henceforth, we’ll spread out our forces
and expand our reach!

Onward, my troops! Let’s find those golden spheres
before our opponents do and claim ourselves
a victory!
All right! I’m so ready for this!

’Tis time to draw the famed blade of
hardened Steel!
I’m counting on you, Your Highness.

I’m counting on you, too, my knight in
shining armor!
Let’s find those golden spheres! Make haste!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4004_100:
’Tis a sphere of gold! This is what we’ve
been looking for, no?
Quick, let’s take it back to our camp at once!

Just like in cooking, you can’t let your guard down
until the final touches are in place.

Aye, you speak the truth. We shan’t let our guards
down as we return.
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4005_100:
I didn’t expect we’d have to traverse this forest to
return to our base camp...
I fear we may be encroaching on enemy territory!

If you want to pass through this forest, you’ll have
to battle us!
Alas! Two members of the opposing team!
We’re not the only ones here!
Yo, yo, yo! It’s your boy, Guzma!
Oh no! Their leader is here, too?!

You went through all that trouble of bringing that
golden sphere here just so we can have it?
Thanks, we’ll take it!
It’s ours now! Hand it over!

Absolutely not. If you’re asking for a battle, a
battle is what you’ll get!

No matter what great forces stand before us, we
shall fight with valor till the very end!

Heh. That so? Then I guess I just have to take it
by force!

Bahaha! Sorry, dude, this golden sphere is ours
now! One down!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4006_100:
Um...is it just me, or have we not moved much
since we left camp?

It’s not just you. We haven’t actually gone very
far at all.

But that’s because that costume is limiting your
movement. It’s not your fault.

What should we do? At this rate, we won’t find
any golden spheres!

Don’t sweat it. Let’s just take it slow and steady,
one step at a time.

No, I can’t take it easy! I want to support
our team!

Well, there is one way to do that... A way that
uses your solid defensive moves to our advantage.
Whaddya think? Pretty good strategy, right?
I love it! Let’s give it a shot!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4007_100:
We’ve got you cornered now. You won’t
get away!
Are you sure you don’t want to surrender?

There’s no way you can beat us when it’s three of
us versus just one of you!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4008_110:
Rewind to before Hilda was cornered by
Erika and the others...
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4008_100:
Awesome! We found a golden sphere! That was
easier than I thought!
At this rate, winning’ll be a cin—
I saw someone moving in the shadows just now.

Y-you mean someone from the other team
is here?

Yeah, I think so. But they’re not making a
move yet...probably because they don’t have
enough backup to take us on.
Hmm... That gives me an idea.

I’m not sure if we’ll be able to buy you enough
time to do that...

If only we were as strong as you, Hilda.
That’d be a different story...

You’ll be fine! We fought together all the way
here, didn’t we?
I know you two can do it. Can I count on you?
Um...OK! If you say so, we’ll give it a try!

Yeah! Next time we see each other, it’ll be with
smiles on our faces, OK?
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4009_100: Ooof!
Oh, are you OK? I hope we didn’t overdo it.

Sorry that we’ve cornered you like this...but a
battle is a battle!
Wow, these two are so easygoing yet so tough...
Whoa, check it out!

Look! The Battle of the Golden Spheres is
happening right here in town!
Oh dear. It seems we’ve drawn a crowd.
Heh heh heh...
Why are you laughing?

Running away was just part of our strategy! Time
to turn these tables around!
Eeep!
Wh-what?
Sorry to keep you waiting, Your Highness!
Not at all! You arrived just in time!

Reinforcements! When did she have time to
contact them?

I knew for a fact that I was being followed! So I
lured you here...all while pretending to be alone!
My teammates bought me some time!
Darn. So it was all a ruse!
Let’s go, Your Highness!
Yes, my valiant knight!

Oh dear... They really have turned the tables
on us!
I guess we have no choice but to surrender!
All right! Now we’ve got two golden spheres!
Wow! That was amazing!
What a fantastic battle!

I think the audience liked that! I’d say your efforts
to captivate everyone with your battle have been
a huge success!
R-really?

Well, I’m still nowhere near as good as you or
Lisia, though...

Are you sure? Look, Keldeo is praising you for a
job well done, too!
Thanks!

Keldeo... I heard that you change forms when
you feel resolute.

I wanna be just like you. I’m gonna keep working
at making my battles look super awesome to keep
my audiences excited!
What a fantastic resolution!

Changes you make on the inside will shine through
in what you do.

C’mon, Diancie. You should get ready, too! We’re
gonna shine like never before!
Well then, shall we return to base camp?
I’ll escort you to your destination, Your Highness!
*chuckle* Thank you!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4010_110:
Guzma has brought one of the golden spheres
back to his team’s base camp!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4010_100: Ready to get back in the game, Buzzwole?
Yeah? All right, time to really do some damage!
Guzma, sir! The enemy stole our golden sphere!
My bad! We weren’t careful enough.

No worries. If they stole it from us, let’s just steal
it right back!
No sense cryin’ over it. Let’s go!
Thank you! And sorry for the inconvenience, sir!

Hmph. Even if they’ve taken our golden sphere,
they still have to take it all the way back to
their camp.

So all we gotta do is storm right into
their territory!
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4011_100:
Well, that was easier than I thought! We got a
golden sphere!
Oui! Let’s bring it back to camp immediately!

Yeah! Even though the other team tried to stop us,
they never stood a chance!

Wait, look! Isn’t that one of the leaders of the
other team?
Do you know about the Steel type?
Korrina! Lt. Surge! Fantina! I’m so sorry! We lost!
And they took our golden sphere...
Heh. We won’t let you block us!

We’ll break through your defense and get back to
our camp!
C’est magnifique! What a perfect defense!

L-let’s retreat for now! There’s no way we’re
getting past that defense!

We did it! Now we’ve got two of these
golden spheres!
That was some impressive defense, m’lady.
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4012_100:
Look. We’ve got two spheres on our side, and
you’ve got two on yours...

So all the spheres still in play are here in
one spot!
Yes, that does seem to be the case.

Which means this battle will decide the winner
once and for all!
We won’t let you take any of our spheres!
We’ll take you down and win the game!

That’s my line! Losing’s not an option
for us, either!
I’m gonna stand out and win this battle!
All five golden spheres are gonna be ours!

I’ll rip that victory away from you if it’s the last
thing I do!

That’s the spirit! I’d expect no less from a
worthy opponent!
Let’s have ourselves a proper duel!

I guess it’d be uncouth of me to jump in at this
point... I’ll bow out and let our leaders decide
the battle.

I’d much rather watch how this plays out as
a spectator anyway. Which team will tip the odds
in their favor?
episode_event_specialcos01_main/4012_110:
The Battle of the Golden Spheres is finally reaching
peak intensity!
Both teams are raring to go!
